title: This Stat About Billionaires Will Shock You
description:
Did you know that among the 10 richest men in the world, there are 15 divorces between them?

Yeah, that’s insane. 

But this is what can happen when a person chooses to chase fortune. There are personal costs to colossal success. Things get complicated quickly. 

What would you be prepared to sacrifice for success?

Get more from Morgan Housel, the mega-bestselling author of The Psychology of Money and his new book, Same as Ever, in this episode of The Subtle Art Podcast. Head to my channel.
